title: Will the pixel 4 support DSDS or DSDA dual-SIM connectivity?
content: I've noticed that the pixel 4 has both an ESIM and nano SIM option, much like the pixel 3a. I know the 3a has had some issues back and forth, and right now it seems to support DSDS. Will the pixel 4 also support having both the ESIM and nano SIM active at once?
